00077             
00096             function                set_add_limitations( $theAddLimitation )
00097             {
00098                   try
00099                   {
00100                         if( $this->AddLimitations === '1 = 1' )
00101                         {
00102                               $this->AddLimitations = $theAddLimitation;
00103                         }
00104                         else
00105                         {
00106                               throw( new Exception( '"AddLimitations" was already set' ) );
00107                         }
00108                   }
00109                   catch( Exception $e )

00111                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00145             function                get_data( $id , $Type , $Name )
00146             {
00147                   try
00148                   {
00149                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00150                         $Type = $this->Security->get( $Type , 'command' );
00151                         $Name = $this->Security->get( $Name , 'command' );
00152                         
00153                         $LinkType = $this->Link->get_link_type( $Type , 'data_extension' );
00154                         
00155                         $Records = $this->Database->select( 
00156                               '*' , 'umx_data_extension' , 
00157                               "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND object_id = $id AND type = $LinkType AND name LIKE '$Name'"
00158                         );
00159                         if( isset( $Records[ 0 ] ) )
00160                         {
00161                               return( get_field( $Records[ 0 ] , 'data' ) );
00162                         }
00163 
00164                         $Records = $this->Database->insert( 
00165                               'umx_data_extension' , 'object_id , type , name' , "$id , $LinkType , '$Name'"
00166                         );
00167                         $this->Database->commit();
00168                         
00169                         return( '' );
00170                   }
00171                   catch( Exception $e )
00172                   {
00173                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00174                   }
00175             }
00176             
00207             function                set_data( $id , $Type , $Name , $Data )
00208             {
00209                   try
00210                   {
00211                         $Data = $this->Security->get( $Data , 'string' );
00212                         
00213                         $OldData = $this->get_data( $id , $Type , $Name );
00214 
00215                         if( $OldData != $Data )
00216                         {
00217                               $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00218                               $Type = $this->Security->get( $Type , 'command' );
00219                               $Name = $this->Security->get( $Name , 'command' );
00220                               
00221                               $LinkType = $this->Link->get_link_type( $Type , 'data_extension' );
00222                         
00223                               $this->Database->update( 
00224                                     'umx_data_extension' , array( 'data' ) , array( "'$Data'" ) , 
00225                                     "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND object_id = $id AND type = $LinkType AND name LIKE '$Name'"
00226                               );
00227                               $this->Database->commit();
00228                         }
00229                   }
00230                   catch( Exception $e )
00231                   {
00232                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00233                   }
00234             }
